name: Korean Beef Zucchini Noodles
description: LOW CARB Korean beef bowls except with zoodles! It is so much healthier and lighter without any of the carb guilt!!!

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, whisk together brown sugar, soy sauce, ginger, sesame oil and Sriracha.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl, whisk together brown sugar, soy sauce, ginger, sesame oil and Sriracha.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add garlic and cook, stirring constantly, until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add ground beef and cook until browned, about 3-5 minutes, making sure to crumble the beef as it cooks; drain excess fat.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add garlic and cook, stirring constantly, until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add ground beef and cook until browned, about 3-5 minutes, making sure to crumble the beef as it cooks; drain excess fat.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in zucchini noodles, green onions and soy sauce mixture until well combined, allowing to simmer until heated through, about 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir in zucchini noodles, green onions and soy sauce mixture until well combined, allowing to simmer until heated through, about 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately, garnished with sesame seeds, if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately, garnished with sesame seeds, if desired.

review.reviewBody: I've made this several times now and it goes quickly in our house! I add about 8oz of cooked linguine in addition to the zoodles since we're not following a low carb diet.
this recipe is beyond delicious & so easy to make.....I have now made it with both ground turkey & ground beef.....OMG
Thanks for a great recipe. We added some carrots, snow peas and mushrooms, it was perfect! Just the right heat.

This was absolutely amazing! Great idea flipping pasta for zucchini. Guilt free Korean Beef without pasta and I used Serve Brown Sugar Replacement to have less carbs . Already added to my Favorites and will be making this again and probably soon . I’ll be making your amazing Hot and Sour Soup to go will it next time and I’m already looking forward to that.Thanks for sharing your recipe with us.
It’s so delicious , thank you for the recipe ❤️
